verbose: The obsolete function 'alloca' is called. In C99 and later it is recommended to use a variable length array or a dynamically allocated array instead. The function 'alloca' is dangerous for many reasons (http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1018853/why-is-alloca-not-considered-good-practice and http://linux.die.net/man/3/alloca).
warning_message: Obsolete function 'alloca' called. In C99 and later it is recommended to use a variable length array instead.
